name: Redwood
author: Redwood
description: Redwood is an opinionated, full-stack, serverless-ready web application framework that will allow you to build and deploy with ease. Imagine a React frontend, statically delivered by CDN, that talks via GraphQL to your backend running on AWS Lambdas (or containers) around the world, all deployable with just a git pushâ€”that's Redwood.
